name: Event Levels
description: Allows you to use the Event Levels button

useDaily.name: Modified Daily Page
useDaily.description: Use a modified version of the <co>Daily Page</c>. Turn off for broken original <cp>Event Levels</c> page

enablePopup.name: Secret Skip Popup
enablePopup.description: Enables secret popup when trying to skip an <cp>Event Level</c>
